name: sbbii
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, wff w0, wff w1
body: |- wb(wsb(s0, s1, w0), wsb(s0, s1, w1))

stmt.origin: impbii(wsb(s0, s1, w0), wsb(s0, s1, w1))

body.origin:
|- wb(wsb(s0, s1, w0), wsb(s0, s1, w1))
-| wi(wsb(s0, s1, w0), wsb(s0, s1, w1))
-| wi(wsb(s0, s1, w1), wsb(s0, s1, w0))

cumulated.origin:
|- wb(wsb(s0, s1, w0), wsb(s0, s1, w1))
-| wi(wsb(s0, s1, w0), wsb(s0, s1, w1))
-| wi(wsb(s0, s1, w1), wsb(s0, s1, w0))

body.origin:
|- wi(wsb(s0, s1, w0), wsb(s0, s1, w1))
-| wi(w0, w1)

cumulated.origin:
|- wb(wsb(s0, s1, w0), wsb(s0, s1, w1))
-| wi(wsb(s0, s1, w1), wsb(s0, s1, w0))
-| wi(w0, w1)

|- wb(wsb(s0, s1, w0), wsb(s0, s1, w1))
-| wi(wsb(s0, s1, w1), wsb(s0, s1, w0))
-| wb(w0, w1)

body.origin:
|- wi(wsb(s0, s1, w1), wsb(s0, s1, w0))
-| wi(w1, w0)

cumulated.origin:
|- wb(wsb(s0, s1, w0), wsb(s0, s1, w1))
-| wb(w0, w1)
-| wi(w1, w0)

|- wb(wsb(s0, s1, w0), wsb(s0, s1, w1))
-| wb(w0, w1)

comment: Infer substitution into both sides of a logical equivalence. (Contributed by NM, 14-May-1993.)
